source_text: A 0.75% NSR royalty exists on the newly acquired Talga Project tenements E45/3679, E45/3857, E45/4137, E45/5595, E45/5596, E45/5571
additional_details: The royalty exists on the newly acquired Talga Project tenements. Global Lithium Resources (GL1) acquired these tenements. The recipient of the royalty is not specified in the document.
